alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 25 at 3:23PM EDT until March 26 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and sleet expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches and sleet accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Central Washington, Interior Hancock, and Southern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 2 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and sleet means periods of snow and sleet will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
